trends: There has been one other sighting in Tiffin
There were no other sightings in Tiffin on or around September 28th 2001
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in tiffin ohio sitting in the car waiting for my girlfriend to finishshopping.I looked to the west sky and there were 3 orange balls of fire withtails.They were steadily coming down. One coming from the north and 2 comingfrom the west.I didn,t see where they landed.The cloulds got in the way.Pleasecontact me if you have any info.
